title: Pulse fire LuLu please?
body:
can we please have a pulse fire lulu skin? i love lulu but all the skins make her look human and more human i do not like any of them and i think pulse fire would be cool for a mage! 

Passive. would be like a little AI unit flying around or a blue AI

Q. would would be like blue rockets or pulses of energy

W-target allie. would be the same speed up but in stead of flowers and leaves there would be more blue coming off the allie
W-target enemy. would turn them into a little robot mouse (like out of star wars XD)

E-target allie. would be a glowing green, blue, or red
E-target enemy. would be a pulse green, blue, or red explosion on the target

R. would be pritty much what it is not but instead o logs hitting them it would be like beams or mettal or some thing shiny and maby the ground around them change? but idk about the ult


i think the abilitys would look cool and that you can make a awesome badass skin! 

{{champion:117}} 4Life
